pr_title: [GEOS-9642] change submit to save where applicable

timeline.message: [GEOS-9642] change submit to save where applicable

timeline.bodyText: Q: Do we need to update the translations at the same time, since the "key" changed.
timeline.author: jodygarnett
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -12,7 +12,7 @@
     <div>
       <ul>
         <li class="button-group selfclear">
-          <button type="submit" wicket:id="submit"><wicket:message key="submit">submit</wicket:message></button>
+          <button type="submit" wicket:id="submit"><wicket:message key="save">save</wicket:message></button>

replies.bodyText: The translations already contain translations for both "save" and for "submit" which are both already in use. So normally nothing should be changed?
replies.author: NielsCharlier
